title: Who Made Me a Princess
author: Plutus
description: When MC opened her eyes, She was a princess! But why does it have to be a princess in this romance novel who has the fate of death from her own blood-related father! my favorite.

title: The Archmage's Daughter
author: Moon Seora
description: Mc searching for her real father. i dont even remember ... updating slow

title: Living as an Emperor's Fiance
author: Dawn Meteor
description: MC accidently got teleported into Emperors office.

title: A Stepmother's Märchen
author: 냥이와향신료
description: MC became the stepmother of 4 kids. They hate her. Timetravel -> they begin to like her.

title: Song of the Sky Walkers
author: Xia Da
description: twins got seperated after birth. a male born with a forehead mole, and a female born with six fingers

title: Lady to Queen
author: Xia Da
description: An empress fell into a trap, divorced and was cut off by her family.

title: Survive As The Hero's Wife
author: Nokki
description: MC reincarnated into the villain of a popular cliché novel. Wants to get a divorce but then changed her mind. Male MC is to cute and to hot, i cant blame her.

title: Beatrice
author: Ma Cherie
description: As the Kingdom of Elpasa fell before the blade of the Empire's greatest hero, in order to survive, Princess Beatrice assumed the guise of 'Chloe', a slave.

title: This Girl Is A Little Wild
author: 303 Planet
description: Mcs soul got swapped from knight to a noble daughter. The knight was always a woman though. Didnt notice it until chapter 49

title: Beast with Flowers
author: Solddam
description: Moo-young, a fierce beast who disguises as a puppy to gain love; and Hwa-yeon, a girl, who raises and trains a large puppy.

title: The Duchess' 50 Tea Recipes
author: Lee Jiha
description: Mc loves tea. Like.. a lot... master of making tea

title: Why Are You Doing This, Duke?
author: Half-moon Ring
description: A marriage with a bipolar(?) husband.

title: Amina of the Lamp
author: Chun Eeyeol
description: Mc got stuck in a Lamp. Luckily a hot guy came by and awakened her.

title: Elskar
author: Wu Na Young
description: MC is not a human (kind of angel(?)) Her whole family got killed. Captured by the Duke.

title: Emperor And The Female Knight
author: Eyeglasses Monkey
description: Strong Female MC, can fight, but can't cook.

title: The Monster Duchess and Contract Princess
author: Liaran
description: little MC wants to escape her family and pleads for the monster Duchess Salvatore to adopt her.

title: I Am a Child of This House
author: Shiya
description: cant remember whats about. but her father bought her. and Everyone loves her. She also has an older brother

title: Lady Baby
author: Ju hyeon
description: MC got reincarneted and her goal is to save her family. smart little girl.

title: A Capable Maid
author: Yuin
description: The useless maid, Marie, has never been able to do anything correctly. But, after caring for a dying prisoner, she becomes a person she had always wanted to be.

title: Gorae Byul - The Gyeongseong Mermaid
author: Ju hyeon
description: 1926, in Japan-occupied Joseon. MC rescued an injured young man. She fell in love with him

title: Beware of the Brothers!
author: Plutus
description: MC got adopted by Duke. Get bullied by her 3 handsome brothers.

title: The Tyrant's First Love
author: Kim Suo
description: MC works as a slave. Has no Memories of her past. Got kidnapped by Emperor.

title: Wait Where the Shooting Star Has Fallen
author: Manmul-sang
description: The tale of a witch and a cat pursuing the whereabouts of a missing shooting star.

title: A False Confession
author: Koo Ara
description: A Pristess confessed to the wrong person. Well.. he is fine too, though

title: The Grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation
author: Mo Xiang Tong Xiu
description: a thrilling story yet hilarious journey of attacking monsters, solving mysteries, and flirtation between LWJ + WWX

title: Golden Time
author: Ryu Hyang
description: The second part of the Light and Shadow trilogy. About the Son of Eli and Edna (from the first part).

title: Glass Wall
author: CHOHO
description: Wealthy and aristocratic.

title: The Evil Lady's Hero
author: Lee Haron
description: Yunifer Magnolia was the best friend of the novel's heroine, Rael Cania, until her love for the male lead turned her into a villainess.

title: The Duchess With An Empty Soul
author: Han Jin-Seo
description: MC found out the truth. The truth, that her fiance had a hidden lover and it was her very own cousin (its a fxking male haha).

title: This Is an Obvious Fraudulent Marriage
author: Park Haedam
description: The daughter of a count family, had to find a husband to be able to inherit her family.

title: To Be You, Even Just For a Day
author: Sam
description: The count's daughter, Psyche, is loved by all. Psyche, who took everything from me. Psyche, who always gets what she wants.

title: Remarried Empress
author: Lee Jiha
description: Finally a real evil MC! sassy and classy. Second female is trash like dark hair male lead.

title: Lamia Orphe is Dead
author: Song Seori
description: something with dragons and who will become the next King

title: Virtues of the Villainess
author: Rat Poop Bird Poop
description: The “villainess”, who now knows Prince Ivana’s deepest secret, attempts to seduce him with -2% cautiousness and 200% cuteness!

title: Salade Days
author: Jing ShuiBian
description: This is the story between a young innocent ballet boy and a passionate, determined boxing boy.
